name: Hurl with Friends
description:
Note: This is online multiplayer only game and cannot be played offline

This game is made in 4 days for WeeklyGameJam 164 to test my custom multiplayer server..

Throw projectiles and hit the targets. First to hit 100 targets will win.  Now supports "Create Room" and "Room List" feature.

Controls

Press W to move forward
Press S to move backwards
Press A to strafe left
Press D to strafe left
Mouse Move to Rotate
Mouse Left Click Down to prepare
Mouse Left Click Release to throw

Sound Effects  are from Sonniss GDC bundle
Made using Unity,  Blender,  Photoshop and Audacity
